00003 ToasterRobotReader::ToasterRobotReader(ros::NodeHandle& node, bool fullRobot) {
00004     fullRobot_ = fullRobot;
00005     std::cout << "[area_manager] Initializing ToasterRobotReader" << std::endl;
00006 
00007     // Starts listening to the topic
00008     sub_ = node.subscribe("/pdg/robotList", 1, &ToasterRobotReader::robotJointStateCallBack, this);
00009 }
00010 
00011 void ToasterRobotReader::robotJointStateCallBack(const toaster_msgs::RobotList::ConstPtr& msg) {
00012     //std::cout << "[area_manager][DEBUG] new data for robot received" << std::endl;
00013 
00014     Robot* curRobot;
00015     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < msg->robotList.size(); i++) {
00016 
00017         // If this robot is not assigned we have to allocate data.
00018         if (lastConfig_.find(msg->robotList[i].meAgent.meEntity.id) == lastConfig_.end()) {
00019             curRobot = new Robot(msg->robotList[i].meAgent.meEntity.id);
00020         } else
00021             curRobot = lastConfig_[msg->robotList[i].meAgent.meEntity.id];
00022 
00023         std::vector<double> robOrientation;
00024         bg::model::point<double, 3, bg::cs::cartesian> robPosition;
00025 
00026         Mobility curRobMobility = FULL;
00027         curRobot->setId(msg->robotList[i].meAgent.meEntity.id);
00028         curRobot->setName(msg->robotList[i].meAgent.meEntity.name);
00029 
00030         curRobot->setMobility(curRobMobility);
00031         curRobot->setTime(msg->robotList[i].meAgent.meEntity.time);
00032         curRobot->busyHands_ = msg->robotList[i].meAgent.busyHands;
00033 
00034         robPosition.set<0>(msg->robotList[i].meAgent.meEntity.positionX);
00035         robPosition.set<1>(msg->robotList[i].meAgent.meEntity.positionY);
00036         robPosition.set<2>(msg->robotList[i].meAgent.meEntity.positionZ);
00037         curRobot->setPosition(robPosition);
00038 
00039         robOrientation.push_back(msg->robotList[i].meAgent.meEntity.orientationRoll);
00040         robOrientation.push_back(msg->robotList[i].meAgent.meEntity.orientationPitch);
00041         robOrientation.push_back(msg->robotList[i].meAgent.meEntity.orientationYaw);
00042         curRobot->setOrientation(robOrientation);
00043 
00044         lastConfig_[curRobot->getId()] = curRobot;
00045 
00046         //TODO: fullRobot case
00047         if (fullRobot_) {
00048             Joint * curJnt;
00049             for (unsigned int i_jnt = 0; i_jnt < msg->robotList[i].meAgent.skeletonNames.size(); i_jnt++) {
00050 
00051                 // If this joint is not assigned we have to allocate data.
00052                 if (lastConfig_[curRobot->getId()]->skeleton_[msg->robotList[i].meAgent.skeletonNames[i_jnt] ] == NULL) {
00053                     curJnt = new Joint(msg->robotList[i].meAgent.skeletonJoint[i_jnt].meEntity.id, msg->robotList[i].meAgent.meEntity.id);
00054                 } else
00055                     curJnt = lastConfig_[curRobot->getId()]->skeleton_[msg->robotList[i].meAgent.skeletonNames[i_jnt] ];
00056 
00057                 std::vector<double> jointOrientation;
00058                 bg::model::point<double, 3, bg::cs::cartesian> jointPosition;
00059 
00060                 curJnt->setName(msg->robotList[i].meAgent.skeletonNames[i_jnt]);
00061                 curJnt->setAgentId(curRobot->getId());
00062                 curJnt->setTime(msg->robotList[i].meAgent.skeletonJoint[i_jnt].meEntity.time);
00063 
00064                 jointPosition.set<0>(msg->robotList[i].meAgent.skeletonJoint[i_jnt].meEntity.positionX);
00065                 jointPosition.set<1>(msg->robotList[i].meAgent.skeletonJoint[i_jnt].meEntity.positionY);
00066                 jointPosition.set<2>(msg->robotList[i].meAgent.skeletonJoint[i_jnt].meEntity.positionZ);
00067                 curJnt->setPosition(jointPosition);
00068 
00069                 jointOrientation.push_back(msg->robotList[i].meAgent.skeletonJoint[i_jnt].meEntity.orientationRoll);
00070                 jointOrientation.push_back(msg->robotList[i].meAgent.skeletonJoint[i_jnt].meEntity.orientationPitch);
00071                 jointOrientation.push_back(msg->robotList[i].meAgent.skeletonJoint[i_jnt].meEntity.orientationYaw);
00072                 curJnt->setOrientation(jointOrientation);
00073 
00074                 lastConfig_[curRobot->getId()]->skeleton_[curJnt->getName()] = curJnt;
00075             }
00076         }
00077     }
00078 }
00079 
00080 bool ToasterRobotReader::isPresent(unsigned int id) {
00081     timeval curTime;
00082     gettimeofday(&curTime, NULL);
00083     unsigned long now = curTime.tv_sec * pow(10, 9) + curTime.tv_usec;
00084     unsigned long timeThreshold = pow(10, 9);
00085     //std::cout << "current time: " << now <<  "  robot time: " << m_LastTime << std::endl;
00086     long timeDif = lastConfig_[id]->getTime() - now;
00087     //std::cout << "time dif: " << timeDif << std::endl;
00088 
00089     if (fabs(timeDif) < timeThreshold)
00090         return true;
00091     else
00092         return false;
00093 }
